text:
Hello,
How do i get the percent discount from quotes via API?
Im only get the dollar discount but not the percent discount

Hello, I'm creating using the custom cards API: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards>, however the card is created but the custom action doesn't appear, and it returns a message in the custom card saying that there was a problem. If anyone could help me i'd appreciate it :slightly_smiling_face:
Hello, does anyone know if there is an API that can be used to send form submissions from a vue.js form to the HubSpot CRM? I am needing emails collected to be sent over to HubSpot.
